main event: An unidentified round object observed by witnesses in Los Alamos, NM, on October 1, 1948.
interesting points: The object changed color from yellow to green., It was described as being round and approximately half the size of a moon., The object dropped 15 degrees in one second., Witnesses reported the object followed a straight vertical drop., The observation lasted only one second.
witness description: A couple observing from a hill near their home.
